original: Bildt, Knut Vincent, överingenjör, Långedrag, f. 14/2/67 i Morlanda, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av sjökapt. Knut B. o. Amalia Apelquist. G. 1. 94 m. Anna Wessman, d. 22; 2. 24 m. Tyra Nilison. Barn: Sigrid f. 95, g. m. lant-br :ing. Claes’ Henrik Wallér, M’almö, Märta 97, g. m. kammarrättsTåd. Gustaf de Laval, Sthlm, Anne-Marie 00, g. m. major Wilh. Henriksson, Boden, Kerstin 02, g. m. ing. T. Hagelbäck, Pamaima, Knut 03i, ing., Växjö, Gil-lis 08. — Stud. v. Gbgs’ ’tekn. sk. Maskining. v. Ystads Sockerraffinad. 96-00, förest, o. anläggn :kontr. v. Gbgs stads’ krafts tat. 00-06, maskin-insp. o. ing. v. Luossavaara-Kiiruna- vaara A-B o. Red :bol. Luleå-Ofoten 06, övering. v. Luossavaara-Kiiruna-vaara A-B 20, övering. v. Trafik A-B Grängesb.-Oxelösund 23-33, ombud f. dess båtkontr. m. Götaverken. Var i Kiruna bl. a. ordn :man o. munic:styr. ordf., v. ordf. i komm :fullm. o. kyr-^ kostämma samt ordf. i styr. f. komm. mellansk. o. yrkessk., landstingsman i Norrb. län 22, v. ordf. i Tekn. samf. i Gbg 25-27, styriled. i A-B D. Ro-bertsons Maskinfabr. t. 42, Claes Johanssons A-B o. Mölnlycke A-B 30, Transatlantic A-B 35-37, Sjöförsäkr. A-B Gauthiod 38. Resor t. Engl., TysM. o. Schweiz 09, USA 11 m. fl. Medarb. i De tekn. vetensk., Gruv-Hjelpmaskiner, Lastn :maskiner. RVO, RNS.-tOOlkl, Hemv. guldplak. 45.
translated:
Bildt, Knut Vincent, chief engineer, Långedrag, b. 14/2/67 in Morlanda, Gbgs o. Boh., son of sea captain Knut B. and Amalia Apelquist. Married 1) in 1894 to Anna Wessman, d. 1922; 2) in 1924 to Tyra Nilison. Children: Sigrid b. 1895, married to agricultural engineer Claes Henrik Wallér, Malmö, Märta b. 1897, married to court judge Gustaf de Laval, Stockholm, Anne-Marie b. 1900, married to Major Wilh. Henriksson, Boden, Kerstin b. 1902, married to engineer T. Hagelbäck, Panama, Knut b. 1903, engineer, Växjö, Gillis b. 1908. 

Studied at Gbgs’ ’tekn. sk. Maskining, v. Ystads Sockerraffinad. 1896-1900, head of construction and contracting at Gbgs stads’ krafts tat. 1900-1906, inspector and engineer at Luossavaara-Kiiruna-vaara A-B and Red:bol. Luleå-Ofoten 1906, chief engineer at Luossavaara-Kiiruna-vaara A-B 1920, chief engineer at Trafik A-B Grängesb.-Oxelösund 1923-1933, representative for its boat contracts with Götaverken. In Kiruna, he was a chairman and municipal council chairman, deputy chairman in the municipal council and church council, and chairman of the board for the municipal intermediate and vocational schools. He was a member of the county council in Norrbotten County in 1922, deputy chairman of the Tekn. samf. in Gbg from 1925 to 1927, board member of A-B D. Robertsons Maskinfabr. t. 1942, Claes Johanssons A-B and Mölnlycke A-B 1930, Transatlantic A-B 1935-1937, and Sjöförsäkr. A-B Gauthiod 1938. He traveled to England, Germany, and Switzerland in 1909 and the USA in 1911. He wrote for De tekn. vetensk., Gruv-Hjelpmaskiner, and Lastn:maskiner journals. He was awarded the RVO, RNS.-tOO1kl, and Hemv. guldplak. in 1945.
